entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
